installCommand.windows: curl -L -o gitlab-mcp-server.tar.gz "https://gitlab.com/masx200/gitlab-mcp-server/-/archive/main/gitlab-mcp-server-main.tar.gz?ref_type=heads" && tar -xzf gitlab-mcp-server.tar.gz && cd gitlab-mcp-server-main && pnpm install && del ..\gitlab-mcp-server.tar.gz
installCommand.mac: curl -L -o gitlab-mcp-server.tar.gz "https://gitlab.com/masx200/gitlab-mcp-server/-/archive/main/gitlab-mcp-server-main.tar.gz?ref_type=heads" && tar -xzf gitlab-mcp-server.tar.gz && cd gitlab-mcp-server-main && pnpm install && rm ../gitlab-mcp-server.tar.gz
installCommand.linux: curl -L -o gitlab-mcp-server.tar.gz "https://gitlab.com/masx200/gitlab-mcp-server/-/archive/main/gitlab-mcp-server-main.tar.gz?ref_type=heads" && tar -xzf gitlab-mcp-server.tar.gz && cd gitlab-mcp-server-main && pnpm install && rm ../gitlab-mcp-server.tar.gz
